title: 304: Bachelor in Paradise: Ep 9 (Forced to Watch Sour Cream Massages & Tough Conversations)
itunes:title: 304: Bachelor in Paradise: Ep 9 (Forced to Watch Sour Cream Massages & Tough Conversations)
description:
It is time for a BIP Recap and while Bekah is with the family in Mexico, Evan (aka 1/2 of Chatty Bros aka Jess’ husband) fills in! They discuss Kendall’s last conversation with Joe and how it hit home for them, the dangerous storm (?), Ed’s shoulders, Riley’s opening up, SOUR CREAM AND MEAT PLAY, Tia’s tattoos, Aaron striking again, that WILD cliffhanger, and more! 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
